full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG RTZE GRVA TSANG GI BRTZI BZHAG TU GNANG BA'I BLO RIGS KYI RNAM BZHAG LEGS BSHAD KUN 'DUS LUNG RIGS KYI BANG MDZOD CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @035A *, ,CES PA 'DI YANG LHO PHYOGS RGYAS SMIN PA, ,PHYIN DRUG DANG PO'I MING CAN GYI NA BAS, ,RANG BZO SPANGS TE MKHAS PA'I GZHUNG BZHIN DU, ,DGA' LDAN RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I GLING DU BKOD, ,'DI BRIS RNAM DKAR DGE BA'I LEGS TSOGS KYIS, ,SANGS RGYAS BSTAN DANG DE 'DZIN SKYES BU RNAMS, ,MI NYAMS BSKAL BRGYA'I BAR DU BRTAN PA DANG, ,BDAG SOGS RNAM MKHYEN GO 'PHANG THOB PAR SHOG ,
author_simple: PHYIN DRUG DANG PO'I MING CAN,
